name: Officer Evax (V)
Lore: 'This Imperial Intelligence leader has a proven track record for predicting Rebel fleet movements. His coordination of starship maneuvers has saved many vulnerable bases.',
Text: 'Imperial Council Member. Agenda: logistics. Once per turn, if at Conference Room, may target an opponent''s starship on table with power < total influence here. Opponent must use +2 Force to move target (or initiate battle there) this turn.',
